quote: Being In The Present Means Tuning Out Distractions And Paying Attention To What Is Important, Now.
author: Spencer Johnson

quote: We have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day.
author: Charles Swindoll

quote: My instinct is always to seek out challenges as opposed to avoiding them.
author: Josh Waitzkin

quote: Identify your problems, but give your power and energy to solutions.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
author: Conrad Hilton
